sections.TOP: Black Cliffs026673o0ofmlp66msvam6j9kmhko6ixjol71l1786312015-03-22T19:26:45ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */The '''Black Cliffs''' are a series of cliffs on the northwest coast of [[Slaver's Bay]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Black Cliffs are a series of cliffs that are situated on the northwest coast of Slaver's Bay, south of the Painted Mountains. They lie between [[Tolos]] and the ruined city of [[Bhorash]], south of the Demon Road.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===
When [[Daenerys Targaryen]] asks for the whereabouts of her largest dragon, [[Drogon]], [[Grey Worm]] informs he was last seen flying over the Black Cliffs three days earlier.<ref>"[[The Children]]"</ref>
